title: Sway
description: There was something different about Jessie. She struggled to fit in at school, surrounded by a web of lies and deceit...until she met Ethan.Based on a true story, the novel “Sway” is about a hearing impaired teenager named Jessie who tries her best to blend in at school. Every day proves to be a test of her resolve when she is constantly plagued by the ruthless pranks of her classmates who are determined to make her life miserable. When a handsome stranger arrives in the nick of time, Jessie wonders if he is too good to be true. Is Ethan’s attention genuine, or will he betray her trust, too?
author: Jennifer   Gibson
